subtitle.Text: Karla: Here we have Fresh Magazine which is a synthesis and pastiche of Sassy Magazine, which if you haven’t looked at it or it wasn’t, you know, something that you cared about in the early 90’s
it was very feminist and strongly individualist and actually gave good advice. It was actually really good.

Anyway, so yeah this is the type treatment, the super grungy type treatment is totally indicative - that’s how it used to be. Oh yeah, and amusingly, of course, our cover model is Rachel, Steve’s wife.
She had to… I had to make her put on this awful light pink lipstick and do the '90s...est stuff imaginable, and she did it!
Steve: It was your idea to put a braid in the front of her bangs…
Steve: Yeah, that seems like… congratulations.
